txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Punctured Shields from brigands, Orcs, and Easterlings in the Great River region. Collect them and deliver them to a task-board in Great River to earn favour with the Riders of Stangard.
You have turned in the punctured shields for a modest reward at the local task-board.
You have not yet collected enough punctured shields to complete your task.
Riders of Stangard Task: Punctured Shields
The Rohirrim of Stangard have posted a task to collect punctured shields from brigands, Orcs, and Easterlings. They can be turned in at any task-board in Great River.
Deliver the punctured shields to any task-board in Great River.
You have accepted a task to acquire punctured shields in the Great River region.
Wanted: Punctured Shields from brigands, Orcs, and Easterlings in the Great River region.
